title: Otome no Renai Jijou
description:
Collection of eight unrelated stories containing good wholesome sex with an emphasis on incest with only one chapter (7) that has demon girls, futanari, tentacles.

1) Manatsu no Koukishin (Midsummer's Curiosity)
2) First Time Job Experience
3) Layer Complex
4) Honors Student
5) Delusional Story
6) Forbidden Parent, First Night
7) Empireo
8) Their Boundries
